amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the total amount of appropriations made available by $1.5 billion to match the FY2018 enacted level.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to reduce the total amount of appropriations made available by $1.5 billion to match the fiscal year 2018 enacted level.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 289 (Roll no. 252).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Norman.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 289 (Roll no. 252).
